rdf:Description.dc:description: "[The Task Force] ... established by the Government of Alberta in December 1988. ... consisting of senior government officials and reporting to the Minister Responsible for Professions and Occupations, the Minister Responsible for Women's Issues, and the Chair of the Council on Professions and Occupations"--p.[1].
